name: Igloo
description:
This is a snow block sandbox type game (snowbox?) where the goal is supposed to be to build an igloo by shaping 6-sided blocks of ice. It's nearly impossible in the current form, but it would probably be better with VR and/or 3D controls. You can also try to build other standing structures.

Controls:
MOVE using arrow keys.
PICK UP a block by right-clicking it while standing nearby.
DUPLICATE a block by holding X while right-clicking.

When holding a block:
POSITION BLOCK using the mouse.
SHAPE BLOCK by holding Z and clicking near an edge to shave that face/edge.
ROTATE BLOCK by holding control and dragging mouse.

Press H to toggle these instructions in game.
